full_text: RT @CynthiaMLummis: Facial recognition for taxpayers. Giving Treasury Secretary power to ban #BTC + digital assets. Intrusive reporting req…

retweeted_status.full_text: Facial recognition for taxpayers. Giving Treasury Secretary power to ban #BTC + digital assets. Intrusive reporting requirements for banking. Absolute LUNACY. Each stands in opposition to 1st principles. I will FIGHT every one of these intrusions into American life and commerce. https://t.co/3nKllGhhwl

quoted_status.full_text: 3/ It doesn’t say it explicitly, but this is a direct attack on the digital asset industry. The Treasury Department already has broad authority in this area, but it has a strict time limit and a public notice requirement.

localize.full_text: RT @CynthiaMLummis: 納税者に顔認証を。財務長官に #BTC + デジタル資産 を禁止する権限を与える。また、このような報告も必要です。
